data.title: While You Were Sleeping | Full Movie | Movies Anywhere
data.meta_description: Purchase While You Were Sleeping on digital and stream instantly or download offline. You'll fall in love with While You Were Sleeping, The hit romantic comedy that woke eveyone up to adorable Sandra Bullock. As Lucy, a lonely subway worker, she becomes smitten with a handsome stranger (Peter Gallager).  But when she saves his life after he's been mugged and fallen into a coma, his hilariously offbeat family mistakes her for his fianc√©! Soon, the mix ups escalate as Lucy fabricates a life between herself and a man she;s never met!  And When Lucy falls for his charming brother (Bill Pullman) the situation really gets uproarious - as she's for to make a choice between the two!
data.text:
Like most American romantic comedies, this is all heart and no head, but it does have a habit of sneaking in some intriguing twists and turns when you least expect it.

September 11, 2020

Bullock gives Lucy just the right amount of edge. Pullman's performance as Peter's down-to-earth younger brother is also a deft mix of moxie and frustration.

May 5, 2020

I don't buy it, and it's the kind of plot that genuinely leaves me cold.

December 27, 2019

The script is actually really solid and the performances are so likable.

June 18, 2019

[Bullock] knows one of the secrets of doing romantic comedy: treating the romance as a good joke.

June 22, 2017
